text: @realDonaldTrump Your CoronaVirus Team, like yourself, is a complete disaster. Democrat governors are trying very hard to work in a positive manner, so of course are complimentary. But you - like the asshole you are - must bring politics into it and admonish @VP for praising a Dem governor.
